note: I am an Indigenous Shackan First Nation (Canada) and Episcopal priest serving as Rector of at Trinity Episcopal in Everett, WA in the USA. I am the Vice-President of the House of Deputies of the General Convention of the Episcopal Church. I love animals and science, Star Trek and Star Wars, as well as the books and worlds of JRR Tolkien and JK Rowling. An anthropologist by training, I appreciate differing worldviews and cultures, and I am passionate about climate justice and social justice.
